description: After recent police shootings, Latino families are having tough conversations about what to do when stopped by police. José Díaz-Balart speaks to Digna Cabral, a mom and city councilwoman, about how she handled the talk with her children and why.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Latino families have ‘the talk’ with loved ones after recent police shootings (Part 2)
description: Dr. Victor Rios, a professor at the University of California at Santa Barbara, had “the talk” about police with his family. José Díaz-Balart shares stories of how Latino families across the country are navigating this difficult topic.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Hiker speaks out after terrifying cougar chase on a Utah mountain
description: Kyle Burgess was hiking in Utah when a cougar began chasing, lunging and charging at him. Burgess recorded the nearly six minute encounter before he was able to scare the animal away with a rock.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Prime Day tips as retailers release big deals now
description: The holiday shopping season is already under way as Amazon rolls out bargains for Prime Day this week. Retailers like Best Buy are also dropping prices, saying the deals will be as good as Black Friday to reduce crowds at stores.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Devastation in Louisiana after Delta slams storm-battered region
description: Crews are surveying the damage and helping residents after Hurricane Delta tore through Louisiana, just weeks after Hurricane Laura. At least three people died because of the storm.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Covid cases spike across Europe as new restrictions announced
description: Italy recorded its highest single-day spike since March and France set an all-time high for new cases this weekend. Prime Minister Johnson announced a new system for restrictions as England’s cases tick up.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: U.S. nears 8 million coronavirus cases
description: At least seven states are setting new single day records as the U.S. averages nearly 50,000 positive cases a day.

title: Trump holds Florida campaign rally one week after leaving hospital
description: President Trump returned to the trail with a rally in Florida ahead of a week of campaign stops across the U.S. Trump’s physician issued a memo saying the president has tested negative for coronavirus.
